name: Hypnophobia
description:
What would you do...

... if you found yourself stranded to your own bed, unable to move your dormant body and to fend for yourself?

... if you felt lost inside a dark version of your own bedroom, terrified by your powerlessness against moving shadows in a hell of pareidolia?

... if you also had to face your own demons, on top of it all?

HYPNOPHOBIA sends you on a twisted journey of survival, as you embody a mysterious protagonist whose past is slowly unveiled... if you manage to make it through each night.

During your sleep, a different demon will appear to haunt you... each with their own agenda, but whose different ends justify the same means: taking control over your body.

And against these nightmarish creatures, your one and only weapon is your ability to convince them to leave you alone.

With several different endings and a plethora of unique dialogue unlocked by your choices, each and every decision counts... and the results range from glorious to utterly catastrophic.

The protagonist’s future, sanity and well-being are in your hands...

This is an early access version. New features, bug fixes and improvements will be released in future updates.
